item.title: [RUDRAGAS] Rudra Gas Enterprise Ltd Signs MoU with Gujarat Government for a 330 Crore Biogas Project
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Rudra Gas Enterprise Ltd has entered into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Government of Gujarat for the proposed establishment of a Biogas Project in the State of Gujarat. The proposed investment is 330 Crore and the project is expected to commence in the year 2027. The Government of Gujarat will facilitate the company in obtaining necessary permissions/registrations/approvals/clearances from concerned departments as per applicable policies, rules and regulations. The project is expected to generate approximately 125 jobs.

item.title: [FRSHTRP*] Puretrop Fruits Ltd. Approves Q3 & Nine Months Results, Appoints New CEO, and Announces Buyback of Equity Shares
item.description:
Puretrop Fruits Ltd. has announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on 31-12-2025. The board approved the results and appointed Ms. Dipti Ashok Motiani as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) subject to shareholder's approval. The board also approved the resignation of Ms. Preeti Jaiswar as Company Secretary and the appointment of Mrs. Vanishika Lunia as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer. Additionally, the board announced a buyback of up to 11,00,000 (Eleven Lakhs) fully paid-up equity shares for an amount not exceeding INR 22,00,00,000. The buyback is subject to approval by shareholders and other regulatory approvals.

  • Puretrop Fruits Ltd. announces unaudited financial results for Q3 and nine months ended on 31-12-2025
  • Ms. Dipti Ashok Motiani appointed as CEO subject to shareholder's approval
  • Resignation of Ms. Preeti Jaiswar as Company Secretary approved
  • Appointment of Mrs. Vanishika Lunia as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer approved
  • Buyback of up to 11,00,000 equity shares announced

item.description:
Tamilnad Mercantile Bank Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 4, 2026, to consider and approve the un-audited financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2025. The meeting is scheduled in accordance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. item.title: [MGEL] Mangalam Global Enterprise Limited Incorporates Wholly-Owned Subsidiary 'Mangalam Global General Trading FZE'
item.description:
Mangalam Global Enterprise Limited has informed the exchange about the incorporation of 'Mangalam Global General Trading FZE' as a wholly-owned subsidiary. This is in continuation of their earlier intimation letter regarding the outcome of the Board Meeting. The subsidiary was initially proposed to be named 'Mangalam Global Dubai LLP', but was later changed to its current name. The subsidiary is based in Dubai and is expected to carry on the business of General Trading. The company has provided all the necessary details as required under Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations and the disclosures are available on the company's website.

item.title: [ADCINDIA] Amphenol Corporation Completes Acquisition of CommScope's CCS Business, Indirectly Gaining Control Over ADC India Communications Ltd
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Amphenol Corporation has completed the acquisition of CommScope's Connectivity and Cable Solutions (CCS) business. This acquisition includes the purchase of 100% equity interests of CommScope Technologies LLC (CST), which holds 4.54% of the voting share capital of ADC India Communications Limited. CommsScope Connectivity LLC, a wholly owned subsidiary of CST and the 'promoter' of ADC India Communications Limited, holds 67.49% of the voting share capital of the company. This acquisition results in an indirect acquisition of the right to direct the exercise of 72.02% of the voting rights in and control over ADC India Communications Ltd by Amphenol Corporation, directly or indirectly through one or more of its subsidiaries.

  • Amphenol Corporation completes acquisition of CommScope's CCS business
  • Includes purchase of 100% equity interests of CommScope Technologies LLC (CST)
  • CST holds 4.54% of the voting share capital of ADC India Communications Limited
  • Indirect acquisition of the right to direct the exercise of 72.02% of the voting rights in and control over ADC India Communications Ltd by Amphenol Corporation
  • CommsScope Connectivity LLC, a wholly owned subsidiary of CST and the 'promoter' of ADC India Communications Limited, holds 67.49% of the voting share capital of the company
